results.title: Top 15 AT&T Competitors and Alternatives | Business Strategy Hub
results.content: In 2021, Verizon was able to make **$95.3 billion** in revenue , and while the company has a roster of different services, it’s main revenue generator is its telecommunications solutions. In 2021, the company earned more than $14.7 billion in revenue [6], however, it’s worth mentioning that T-Mobile doesn’t offer a comprehensive range of services compared to both AT&T and Verizon, but is still amongst one of the biggest AT&T competitors. The organization was founded in 1995, in Germany and apart from telecommunications and mobile services, the company has several other subsidiaries across the globe. While the company’s primary revenue generator are its telecommunication services, they do offer several other services such as broadband solutions, digital media, and IT.
